summary: Adds 2 Kids Khajiits with the beautiful House Cats of Mihail ! No DLC needed
descriptionHtml:
[i][b]Come and see the House Cats of Vharje kid and Nelkar, two young Khajiits who live in Breezehome (Whiterun)

Come to invoke duets of cats who will follow you as if you were their mother ...

At the entrance of the house, Felix awaits you to accompany you wherever you want ![/b][/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/MGhDGl8.gif[/img]

[color=#00ff00]No DLC Needed[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française[/color]


10 variants colors


[i]These cats do not meow constantly, just a very quiet purr ![/i]


This mod is an extension (but it is a standalone mod) of my mods [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53078]Pets Kingdom [/url]or [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72329] Cats Kingdom [/url] with the same Khajiits as in my mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87326]Khajiit's Family House [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/3PfHOMu.gif[/img]


You can also buy the spell books at [color=#00ff00]Farengar Secret-Fire[/color] in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Cat"

In order to buy the 6 books at Farengar, you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18012408464816616015495176.jpg][img]http://nsm07.casimages.com/img/2018/01/24//18012408464816616015495176.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/color] for the Followers : Felix + [b][i]the 2 childs [/i][/b]!

You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?] Amazing Follower Tweaks [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel

[img]https://i.imgur.com/xurvEbo.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000] Credits[/color]

[color=#00ff00]MoRZiLLo and Renamon[/color] for « Vharje Kid » and « Nelkar », in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51573/?] Khajit Female Marriage [/url]
(« You can use at your own MOD or whatever you create without my permission.It's totally Free »)

[color=#00ff00]Mihail Romanov[/color] for the House Cat in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88386/?] House Cats- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - pets- witcher) [/url] (Also [color=#00ff00] CD PROJEKT RED[/color] for the Witcher and [color=#00ff00] LorSakyamuni[/color] to convert the cat)

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/31991110/?] PanPi [/url]for the 4 new textures (Dark Brown, Spotted, Ginger, White)
